title: Procurement Manager
description: Promote diversity and inclusion in the supply chain, manage supplier diversity programs, and assess supplier performance.
responsibilities: Promote supplier diversity initiatives and inclusion. Identify and onboard diverse suppliers. Monitor compliance with diversity goals and regulations.

skills.name: Supplier diversity programs Diversity and inclusion initiatives Supplier assessment and certification Data collection and reporting Vendor outreach and engagement Strategic planning Communication skills Relationship building Attention to diversity and inclusion principles
